TopicTitle: What the best wing for ksp?

Articles.Content: Does someone know a mod that has airplane-like wings, when i put the wings from the game when i take off my plane keeps tilting to the right.Maybe a mod will fix this.

Your plane tilting problem is likely a design issue. Modded wings are not the solution for that.

Are you flying with SAS activated? Set it to heading hold. Or try the Atmospheric Autopilot mod's fly by wire to see how well it compensates for the flight instability.

Does your plane have more wings on one side than the other, or other asymmetry? That could cause more lift on the left side to force a right tilt.

Is there a science part or other accessory on the right side causing drag?

OK, after covering that, here are some fun wing mods:

1) B9 Procedural Wings. This allows you to customize wing shapes and other parameters. It's nicer than trying to build a big wing from many small wing parts.

2) OPT Orbital Portal Technologies. It mostly offers entirely new spaceplane fuselage profiles and engines, but also has some beautiful scifi style wings.
